entries.meaning: Agent noun of bed; one who beds.
(in combination, informal) A property with a specified number of bedrooms.
examples: From looking round, I realized that the gap in the market was for smart one-bedders in central locations.

entries.meaning: (Cambridge University slang) Contraction of bedmaker; a housekeeper or domestic cleaner (historically a domestic servant), generally female, employed by one of the constituent colleges of Cambridge University to clean rooms; generally equivalent to a modern scout at Oxford University..
